basics.name: Abdul Rehman
basics.label: Game Developer
basics.summary: I completed my B.S. in Computer Science in 2017. Since then, I have gained professional experience in Unity development, specializing in creating engaging mobile games and solutions using C# and Unity tools.

work.summary: Senior Game Developer in a Team (Playspare)
highlights: Led development and prototyping of mobile game features, mentoring junior developers
Built and delivered full-fledged game solutions, ensuring quality and performance
Collaborated with a team to design and create engaging gameplay experiences
I have led development teams, creating prototypes for junior developers and delivering complete game projects
My focus is on crafting interactive and engaging mobile game experiences.
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
